sourcesContent:
import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form";
import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row";
import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col";
import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button";

const ProfileDetails = ({ user }) => {
  const [allowEdit, setAllowEdit] = useState(true);

  return (
    <>
      <Form>
        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Username
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control
              plaintext
              readOnly={allowEdit}
              value={user.username}
            />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Password
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control
              plaintext
              readOnly={allowEdit}
              value={user.password}
            />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Name
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control plaintext readOnly={allowEdit} value={user.name} />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Institution
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control
              plaintext
              readOnly={allowEdit}
              value={user.institution}
            />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Address
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control plaintext readOnly={allowEdit} value={user.address} />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Email
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control plaintext readOnly={allowEdit} value={user.email} />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>

        <Form.Group as={Row}>
          <Form.Label column sm="2" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
            Contact
          </Form.Label>
          <Col sm="10">
            <Form.Control plaintext readOnly={allowEdit} value={user.contact} />
          </Col>
        </Form.Group>
      </Form>

      <Button
        variant="dark"
        size="sm"
        onClick={() => setAllowEdit(!allowEdit)}
        style={{
          marginTop: "20px",
          width: "fit-content",
          alignSelf: "center",
        }}
      >
        Edit
      </Button>
    </>
  );
};

export default ProfileDetails;
